name: Tough Man
description:
Tough Man are very interesting and make me laugh every time!

Hold your finger on the screen to start the game, and lift your finger when the pointer points to the green and blue areas.
Then witness the growth of the man!
Ha, I laughed out loud!

Features:
◉ Perfect design,Full of funny.
◉ Endless upgrade levels
◉ Full phone support
◉ Totally free download

Tough Man is Suit for all age and completely FREE to play!
Now play and become the strongest man in world!
